name: classroom-app
description: A comprehensive digital classroom management platform with AI-powered features

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:backend:watch & npm run test:frontend:watch
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:frontend:ci
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"

author: Classroom App Team
